sentence.Network_en: He started his new job inauspiciously on Friday the 13 th.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在星期五(十三号)找到新工作,真是不走运.

sentence.Network_en: The thirty - second day out of Bombay began inauspiciously.
sentence.Network_cn: 离开孟买的第三十二天就开始就出现了不详之兆.

不祥地(inauspiciously)不相容(incompatibility) 收入(income) 小共戴天(incompossible) 梦魔(incubus) 优柔寡断(indecision) 不明.

list.abs: August 8 , 2008 , this inauspicious day , Guangzhou City Leishi Table Company officially changed its name to Guangzhou Lee Table Company !2008年8月8日，这个吉利的日子，广州市雷士表业公司正式更名为广州市李氏表业公司！
an inauspicious occasion , event , meeting , etc., 预兆不祥的情况 , 事件 , 会面等.
IT HAS been an inauspicious start to the year for justice in the UAE ., 对阿联酋的法律界来说 , 新年伊始并不是一个良好的开端.

in China , new year's celebration's time cannot use " the ghost " , " dies " the phrase at will , otherwise is very inauspicious , moreover does not like to some inauspicious digit .在中国，过年的时候不能随意地用“鬼”、“死”的字眼，否则很不吉利，而且对一些不吉利的数字也不喜欢。
